mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_num, c.id, c.pnum, c.pqty, p.pimage, p.pname, p.price, p.point, p.pspec FROM tbl_cart c, product_info p WHERE c.pnum = p.pnum AND c.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_cart(id, pnum, pqty) VALUES(#{id}, #{pnum}, #{pqty})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_cart WHERE id = #{id} AND pnum = #{pnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_cart SET pqty = #{pqty} WHERE cart_num = #{cart_num}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_cart WHERE pnum = #{param1} AND id = #{param2}
